Dropify

Groove Technology

Dulcie Tran H.P Dung

Introduction

Dropify is a music streaming service that connects to your Dropbox, analyses your music library, allows you to organise and play your music through clients for all platforms, iOS, Android, Windows, Mac, Linux, Web Browsers, Chrome Extension. Your library, playlists, listening preferences, history, etc. are synced between all devices.
